Formulating research questions

Asking questions is easy. Asking answerable questions is more difficult.

Learning Path

Where we‚Äôve been

  • Learning how to interact with data
  • Reviewing the available data and thinking of a topic area of interest

Where we‚Äôre at

Ready to start asking research questions to explore for the rest of the term.

Objectives

Items
Write down several research questions that are answerable with your data
